verses.name: John 7:11
verses.text: Then the Jews sought him at the feast, and said, Where is he?

verses.name: John 7:12
verses.text: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him: for some said, He is a good man: others said, Nay; but he deceiveth the people.

verses.name: John 7:13
verses.text: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews.

verses.name: John 7:14
verses.text: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple, and taught.

verses.name: John 7:15
verses.text: And the Jews marvelled, saying, How knoweth this man letters, having never learned?

verses.name: John 7:16
verses.text: Jesus answered them, and said, My doctrine is not mine, but his that sent me.
